column3: Okay, all you Scuba Diver lovers,Sharky's Scuba Dive Shop, San Dimas, CA is the place to go.Get all your dive equipment and training. They have great instructors and friendly workers.Lil Monster and Saay are friendly and courteous and can help you find all the dive equipment for a fun and adventurous dive. Let yourself have some fun.The store owner Craig is very knowledgeable about a wide variety of subjects. Don't forget to ask about the next dive trip.
